import React from 'react'; class CreateAdopterForm extends React.Component { state = { name: "", age: "", location: "", residence_type: "", allergy: "", pet: "", img_url: "" } handleChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() this.props.createAdopter(this.state) console.log(this.state.pet) } render(){ return(

Create an Adopter Account!

) } } export default CreateAdopterForm
